name: Royal Offense (itch)
description:
Royal Offense contains elements of role play: while fulfilling your orders, the heroes improve their skills and talents, as well as earn gold to be spent on new equipment, weapons, and magical elixirs.

'Royal Offense' does NOT requires Internet, does NOT spam notifications, does NOT limits your play time with energy and days of waiting.

Game Features:

Legendary indirect control strategy totally adapted for PC/MAC.

10+ types of heroes with dozens of statistics, weapons and armour.

A dozen types of monsters.

Several dozen spells.

16 scenario missions.

3 difficulty levels.

This game is developed by me - alone. And if you like to add or fix anything - just email or tweet me.

https://twitter.com/EliteGamesNet
